column4: quick question... if  I want to enable sound output for BOTH, my HDMI and Headphone out jack... how can I do this in ubuntu 8.10?
I think that requires some clever fiddling with the ALSA configuration in ~/asoundrc
I know you can configure it to split one sound card into several virtual devices, and combine multiple devices into one virtual device. I think you need the latter
I'd say search for advanced ALSA configuration guides
